LanguageData.Craft_MeleeWeapon_MonoSword.label: Create monosword
LanguageData.Craft_MeleeWeapon_MonoSword.description: To create a monosword, you need to use the best materials and all your forging knowledge
LanguageData.Craft_MeleeWeapon_Zeushammer.label: Create zeushammer
LanguageData.Craft_MeleeWeapon_Zeushammer.description: To create a zeushammer, you need to use the best materials and all your forging knowledge
LanguageData.Craft_MeleeWeapon_PlasmaSword.label: Create plasma sword
LanguageData.Craft_MeleeWeapon_PlasmaSword.descriptio: To create a plasma sword, you need to use the best materials and all your forging knowledge
LanguageData.Craft_MeleeWeapon_MonoSwordBladeLink.des: To create a monosword, you need to use the best materials and all your forging knowledge. To make it bladelink you need to sacrifice a living soul.
LanguageData.Craft_MeleeWeapon_ZeushammerBladeLink.de: To create a zeushammer, you need to use the best materials and all your forging knowledge. To make it bladelink you need to sacrifice a living soul.
LanguageData.Craft_MeleeWeapon_PlasmaSwordBladeLink.d: To create a plasma sword, you need to use the best materials and all your forging knowledge. To make it bladelink you need to sacrifice a living soul.
